sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import "../styles/AboutUs.css"; // Make sure this file exists and contains any custom styles you want const restaurantBenefits = [ { title: 'Create & Customize with Ease', description: 'Build a beautiful, dynamic digital menu in minutes. Add mouth-watering photos, detailed descriptions, and update prices or availability instantly.' }, { title: 'Reduce Costs & Waste', description: 'Say goodbye to the endless cycle of printing, reprinting, and laminating paper menus. Save money and be more eco-friendly.' }, { title: 'Increase Efficiency', description: 'Receive clear, accurate online orders directly from the table to your kitchen, reducing errors and freeing up your staff to focus on service.' }, { title: 'Delight Your Customers', description: 'Offer a modern, convenient, and contactless experience that today\'s diners expect, leading to higher satisfaction and return visits.' }, ]; const dinerBenefits = [ { title: 'Instant Access', description: 'Simply scan the QR code on your table to instantly pull up the complete, up-to-date menu on your own device.' }, { title: 'Browse Visually', description: 'See what looks good with high-quality, enticing images of every dish, helping you choose your next favorite meal.' }, { title: 'Order on Your Time', description: 'Ready to order? Place it directly from your phone. Need another drink? Just a few taps away. No more waiting.' }, { title: 'Safe & Simple', description: 'Enjoy a completely contactless ordering and payment process for a safer, more convenient, and worry-free dining experience.' }, ]; const Aboutus = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('restaurants'); return (
{/* Hero Section */}

The Future of Dining is Just a Scan Away

We're seamlessly connecting restaurants and their patrons through elegant, intuitive technology, making the dining experience more efficient and enjoyable for everyone.

{/* Interactive Benefits Section */}

A Smarter Way to Serve & Dine

Discover the benefits for your business and your customers.

{activeTab === 'restaurants' && (
{restaurantBenefits.map(benefit => (

{benefit.title}

{benefit.description}

))}
)} {activeTab === 'diners' && (
{dinerBenefits.map(benefit => (

{benefit.title}

{benefit.description}

))}
)}
{/* How It Works Section */}

How It Works

A seamless experience from scan to satisfaction.

1

Scan the QR Code

Customers use their smartphone camera to scan the unique QR code at their table.

2

Browse & Order

The interactive menu appears instantly. They can browse, select items, and place their order.

3

Enjoy the Meal

The order is sent directly to the kitchen, and food is served. It's that simple!

{/* Our Story Section */}

Our Story

We're a team of foodies, tech geeks, and hospitality veterans. The idea was born over a meal where we spent more time trying to order than enjoying our food. We decided to combine our passions to build a solution that we, and our favorite restaurants, would genuinely love to use.

We believe that technology should enhance life's best moments, and a shared meal is one of the most important.

Your team photo here
{/* CTA Section */}

Join Us in Revolutionizing the Dining Experience

Ready to empower your business with a modern, efficient, and cost-effective menu solution? Let's get started.

Request a Demo
); }; export default Aboutus;
